Can an absence be reported for care when.answer: You may also be required to provide further information about enrolled children to the Department of Social Services on request. ... This means that you cannot report an absence for a child before they start attending care at your service or after a child has physically ceased care at your service.

How many absences are allowed in childca.answer: Under the Child Care Subsidy families are allowed 42 absence days per child, per financial year. These 42 allowable absences can be taken for any reason, including public holidays and when children are sick, without the need for families to provide documentation.
